scripts.server: pnpm run typecheck && pnpm run rmdir -- dist && pnpm run esbuild && pnpm run importPathUpdate && pnpm run serverRun
scripts.rmdir: node -e "var fs = require('fs'); try{process.argv.slice(1).map((fpath) => fs.rmdirSync(fpath, { recursive: true }))}catch(err){console.log(`Dist not found`)}; process.exit(0);"
